headline: Crews Working 24/7 to Restore Power to FirstEnergy Customers Following Severe Thunderstorms
summary: Power has been restored to nearly 261,000 of the approximately 311,000 FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE) customers who lost service due to severe storms that swept across the company's service territory on Sunday. FirstEnergy's electric company personnel will continue to work around the clock in 16-hour shifts, aided by additional line workers and support personnel from outside the company, to make repairs as quickly and safely as possible.
